item.title: Who the Hell Opens a Video Store in 2025? Renoir, That’s Who
item.description: A direct descendant of the Impressionist master has made a bold stroke of his own: opening a VHS rental place in Burbank in the age of streaming.

item.title: Who the Hell Opens a Video Store in 2025? Renoir, That’s Who

item.title: After 8.8 Magnitude Quake Near Russia, Tsunami Waves Reach Japan, Hawaii and California
item.description: Several people were injured, but none gravely, and no major damage has been reported so far.

item.title: Move Over Angelyne: Meet the Sisters Battling to Become L.A.’s New Billboard Queen
